solution_line_template: Gumball's total water intake on Monday, Thursday, and Saturday is {liters_per_day_mon_thu_sat} x {num_days_mon_thu_sat} = <<{liters_per_day_mon_thu_sat}*{num_days_mon_thu_sat}={total_mon_thu_sat}>>{total_mon_thu_sat} liters.

And his total water intake on Tuesday, Friday, and Sunday is {liters_per_day_tue_fri_sun} x {num_days_tue_fri_sun} = <<{liters_per_day_tue_fri_sun}*{num_days_tue_fri_sun}={total_tue_fri_sun}>>{total_tue_fri_sun} liters.
So his total water intake for 6 days is {total_tue_fri_sun} + {total_mon_thu_sat} = <<{total_tue_fri_sun}+{total_mon_thu_sat}={total_six_days}>>{total_six_days} liters.
Therefore Gumball's water intake on Wednesday is {total_water_week} - {total_six_days} = <<{total_water_week}-{total_six_days}={water_wednesday}>>{water_wednesday} liters.
